{"id":938208191,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1682220674,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/938208191/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make All Array Elements Equal to 1","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int gcd(int a, int b) {\n        if (b == 0) {\n            return a;\n        }\n        return gcd(b, a % b);\n    }\n\n    int minOperations(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int ops = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            if (nums[i] == 1) {\n                continue;\n            }\n            if (i < n - 1 && nums[i + 1] != 1) {\n                nums[i] = gcd(nums[i], nums[i + 1]);\n                nums[i + 1] = 1;\n                ops++;\n            } else {\n                int j = i;\n                while (j >= 0 && nums[j] != 1) {\n                    nums[j] = gcd(nums[j], nums[j + 1]);\n                    nums[j + 1] = 1;\n                    ops++;\n                    j--;\n                }\n                if (j < 0) {\n                    return -1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ops;\n    }\n\n\n\n};\n\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-all-array-elements-equal-to-1","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
